::Zardus::

Zardus smiles as he sees Delta turn his head, announcing his rebirth.

"Yes, as a matter of fact, you are. And in good health it seems," Zardus 
looks at the Protoform 5. He didn't bother introducing himself or saying 
where Delta was. He had programed all that into the bots memory while 
rebuilding him. Zardus turns to Nemesis.

"Nemesis, meet Protoform 5, alias Delta," he says and turns back to Delta, 
"Delta, meet Nemesis Enforcer. If I am unavailable, you will follow his 
orders."

Suddenly, Zardus' wrist comp beeps, reporting Hell Beast's message. Zardus 
growls. It would probably be to his advantage to sit tight untill later. He 
activates his comm-link.

"Hell Beast," he says into it, sending the message to the predacon commander, 
"I am having some ... internal trouble right now. I will send help as soon as 
I can."

With that, Zardus turns around, deactivating his comm-link.

"Meet me back at the bridge," he says to the two bots in the room and walks 
out, heading for the bridge.
